I think I have you beat.
(I bet they'd feel good pressed against mine.)
See? It's not so scary, is it?
It was a long, hard battle, but we finally wore you down.
You've been lucky so far, but just you wait.
How'd I get so nude so fast?
(I could've sworn I just saw it move.)
Oh that's what that was? I thought it was a mace... I've been hanging around too many adventurers.
I'm suddenly in the mood for Italian.
I mean sure, but... where's your sense of spirit?
You have a lot of catching up to do.
(Thank goodness! Thought I was gonna get a bullet in my head...)
Are we losing the knife? Good...
I knew you were gonna do that...
This is a casual affair. Lose the fancy jewelry.
No naughty bits for you, losers!.
You have to catch up to me.
Club what? I don't think that'd go over so well back home.
Really? Cause I know a guy. He just grows 'em back. Crazy German scientist...
How do you even fight in that thing?
Hey Tracer, why's that glowy thing starting to--
That's it, just keep it coming.
(Good thing too... I almost jumped the gun.)
(Easy there, Marcy. She's supposed to finish, not you.)
Speechless to the end, I see.
Care to play a bonus round?
When you cum in that state, do the rest cum too? Do you feel the orgasm of a thousand avatars?
At least it improved your mood. If only a little.
I wonder how many EMF sensors you just set off.
I enjoyed today's session. Let's do it again next week.
I showed you mine, now show me yours.
Just look at Jane. She's your friend, right?
I can get behind that ideology.
Whoa, Mileena! And here you were being so modest!
(Sliding... up and down... I bet it feels...)
Here I am with my tits out, and that's all you'll show? Well... we'll change that.
Don't worry, we'll get those puppies lose eventually!
Have we met before? You look so familiar.
Are you so eager to catch up?
You're no stranger to this game, I see.
I'm more than ready for this...
Let's see how much you enjoy seeing me...
Ta-da! I know, fascinating, aren't they?
If you stare long enough, they start to stare back.
I was starting to feel more nude with these things than without.
Wow. I'm the worst poker player.
You really wanna see all of me, don't you?
Watch closely now. I'm only doing it once.
You've worked hard for this. Now here's your prize.
Looks like you get to see me nude after all.
You look like you're having a bad time.
Don't worry, I'll be nice and thorough.
But we're not in a doctor's office, are we?
This is what it took? Well... all worth it.
Oh dear, I think the police is knocking at the door.
A naked boy and a naked girl? Time to let nature do the rest.
Not too big, not too small, but juuuust right~
I like it! Very Addams Family meets Beetlejuice.
You've got style. I like it.
Looks like a strawberry parfait. Tasty.
Let's be real, Jasmine... you weren't fooling anyone.
I never would have guessed pink.
Damn, girl! You've been pumping some iron!
So glad you could join us.
Let's take a peek down under.
Yeah yeah, don't rub it in...
This isn't a charity. You'll have to take your turn soon enough.
Want me to pose for you?
Will you do it for a scooby snack?
I'm already nude, so you won't be alone.
We should make a calendar together.
Methinks we'll need to mop the floors after all this.
(I'd be more annoyed if she wasn't so adorable.)
Either that's dyed, or Japan sure is weird.
Ah, you're just robbing Peter to pay Paul.
Yeesh, calm down! Why are you even here?
Well! I see you're rarin' to go.
You really need a chill pill.
Well there's something you don't see every day!
Yep, good thing I didn't lose... heh.
Just think of it as performance art.
Maybe this'll help you loosen up.
Couldn't magic your way out of this one, could you?
You really have some catching up to do.
No worries. That just makes the final prize all the more sweeter.
Too bad I can't join. Rules are rules, I suppose.
(I've gotta stop myself from doing it too...)
Maybe I'll write a song about you.
Can I see how it feels against my face?
"Hyaaah" to you too! I see all that adventuring's paying off.
You were waiting to show those off, weren't you?
Okay funny. Now let the air out.
Don't be rude, people. Her eye is up there.
Come on, ~name~, you're just gonna leave me nude?
You have such a way with words.
Don't worry, I'll be joining you soon, I'm sure.
If I'm naked, you should be too.
You just need a chance to show what you're made of.
A real man can satisfy her at any size, isn't that right?
That's all? And here I am in the nude.
Can you show me the time machine you used to get that ascot?
What a shame. It looked fun to play with.
We should do a photo shoot together.
See? It's not so scary, is it?
It was a long, hard battle, but we finally wore you down.
That's it? Come on, I'm already nude!
Oh that's what that was? I thought it was a mace... I've been hanging around too many adventurers.
Why do I suddenly want Italian food?
Why did you come here, again?
You have a lot of catching up to do.
(Thank goodness! Thought I was gonna get a bullet in my head...)
Are we losing the knife? Good...
I knew you were gonna do that...
This is a casual affair. Lose the fancy jewelry.
Club what? I don't think that'd go over so well back home.
Really? Cause I know a guy. He just grows 'em back. Crazy German scientist...
How do you even fight in that thing?
Hey Tracer, why's that glowy thing starting to--
(That looks more fun than poker anyway.)
Speechless to the end, I see.
Care to play a bonus round?
When you cum in that state, do the rest cum too? Do you feel the orgasm of a thousand avatars?
At least it improved your mood. If only a little.
Do you cum from a land down under?
I enjoyed today's session. Let's do it again next week.
You're not alone. At least there's that.
Just look at Jane. She's your friend, right?
I can get behind that ideology.
Whoa, Mileena! And here you were being so modest!
(You like my body, don't you? You love my body.)
Are you so eager to catch up?
You're no stranger to this game, I see.
You've seen all of me. Now let me see all of you.
Oh darn, looks like we'll both be naked together. Shame.
(Good thing I trimmed my nails this morning.)
(I'm gonna have to go through with it, aren't I?)
Gotta admit, this part's new even to me.
Let's see how long I can hold out.
You are not allowed to stream this, you hear?
Look as long as you want, but photography is strictly prohibited.
Looks good for being a thousand years old, doesn't it?
It's as fun to play with as it is to eat.
Me first? Well okay. You guys earned it.
I'm first, huh? Alright, time for the grand finale.
Oh well. At least I have some eye candy.
I have to say, part of me is glad.
(It would hurt me. I'd love it.)
(That's it, bare it all for me...)
Come with me... I mean-- haha! *Ha...*
We could help each other out...
Play with your tits a little...
A couple more rounds and ah--! You can... ahhh...
(You are really messing with my concentration...)
(I bet it would feel so warm pressed against mine..)
(I can imagine it pressed against mine... their soft lips overlapping... their clits touching together...)
Could you ah cast it on me too?
(Let me bury my face in them...)
We could do it to each other...?
Spread your legs wide... I wanna see...
You just n-never ta-hha-alk, do you?
(I can imagine it... sliding in and out...)
(I can picture it... filling every inch... ahh...)
(If you're lucky, maybe I'll get your help.)
I can't take it... I'm gonna burst...
Oh Bonnie! Bonnie! Fuck me! Fuck meee!!
Did I make you more confident?
That's all you'll show? After all that?
You can do better, can't you?
(Hey ~name~... I'm all lubed up for ya now.)
Why even hide all that? I'd be showing off.
Where was that when I needed it?
Hate to break it to ya, Jasmine... you weren't fooling anyone.
(Now that I'm all lubed up, you could slide right in.)
(Why not. I'm feeling brave after all that.)
I'll use your panties to mop up.
Don't think you're off the hook.
I thought I'd turned you on more than that, ~name~.
It'll happen soon enough, just you wait.
Don't get too cocky. Just give it time.
I'm surprised you held off... heh..
As long as there's-- ah... someone to watch...
I want to see all of you...
I take it I impressed you.
Hey ~name~, let's press our lips together. And not the ones on our heads.
I think I could go another round... Care to join me?
Oh I can't wait for you to lose again.
Let me get a good look...
If you'll do it... so will I... again...
Do you need me to show you again?
Couldn't magic your way out of this one, could you?
Well I have to keep up with the instructor, don't I?
A little late, but I'm not complaining.
No need to be so shy. Just look at me!
Don't go easy just because I'm done...
(You're gonna cum in two seconds after that show, aren't you?)
I'd go for more, but... oh hell, why not.
I think I could manage another go.
Those look heavy. Want me to hold them for you?
If those get too heavy, you can rest them on my face.
Don't be rude, people. Her eye is up there.
Is that a bulge I see?
You're not so shy now, are you?
Not so shy now, are you?
You're not off the hook, ~name~. Let's see it.
(That would have looked nicer a few minutes ago.)
A little late to the party, don't you think?
So much for so little... ah well. I had my fun.
I think I made more of a mess than you.
I can see why everyone likes this game.
You're cold, I can tell. I know how you can warm up...
Want me to keep them warm for you?
Hey ~name~, wanna play "doctor"? I can give you an examination.
Nude exercise is the best exercise.
Come on, ~name~, you won't regret it.
You're a little behind, don't you think?
Still shy, even after all that?
Really now, what's with the knife?
If you need some quarters that badly...
Your legs are quivering... so are mine... heh..
Speechless to the end, I see.
At least it improved your mood. If only a little.
Great session. Let's meet again next week.
And here you were being so modest...
Keep going... you're making me feel re-energized.
Ahh... as long as there's fuel for the fire...
(I am sooo glad I finished before this.)
Are you so eager to catch up?
Feeling brave after all that, huh?
Haha... ha... wow... that was... intense.
Hee hee... I can't stop shaking...
You ever feel like playing again, just say the word.
You sure know how to have fun. Let's play again sometime.
I like this game. Even when I lose, I still win.

text.content: Okay, I'm here! Now why were you so anxious to bring me over?
Oh, no reason. I was just getting so lonely, is all.
Well, I was getting a little tired from work...
There, see? You need to take it easy. Unwind, have some fun...
Well, okay... I suppose I can take a break for at least-- oh? Who's this?
Bonnie, meet ~name~. We played a fun game last night that I think you'll really enjoy.
Oh you'd love it! It's all about probability and psychological evaluation. Isn't that right, ~name~?
Probability and-- Is it poker? I know what that is, you know.
Good! Then I won't bother explaining how to play.
When did you suddenly get into poker?
Since I found out how much fun it could be! Now go ahead and deal us in, ~name~.
Well, I suppose. Though I've never been very good at it, to be honest.
Hehe, that's no problem. Nooo problem at all.
Oh, and did I mention? This is a very special kind of poker.
